scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc src/assembly/index.ts -b build/assembly/untouched.wasm -t build/assembly/untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug    --runtime full --importMemory --sharedMemory 65536 --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc src/assembly/index.ts -b build/assembly/optimized.wasm -t build/assembly/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --runtime full --importMemory --sharedMemory 65536 --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.start: npm i && npm run build && npm run dev
